FlowAliasRoutingConfigurationListItem.description: Details about the routing configuration for a Flow alias.

FlowVersion.markdownDescription:
Version.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 5  
Pattern: ^(DRAFT|[0-9]{0,4}[1-9][0-9]{0,4})$  
Update requires: No interruption

FlowAliasRoutingConfigurationListItem.markdownDescription:
Details about the routing configuration for a Flow alias.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

TagsMap.description: A map of tag keys and values

^[a-zA-Z0-9\\s._:/=+@-]*$.markdownDescription:
Value of a tag

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9\s._:/=+@-]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

TagsMap.markdownDescription:
A map of tag keys and values

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

FlowArn.markdownDescription:
Arn representation of the Flow

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^arn:aws(-[^:]+)?:bedrock:[a-z0-9-]{1,20}:[0-9]{12}:flow/[0-9a-zA-Z]{10}$  
Update requires: Replacement

Description.markdownDescription:
Description of the Resource.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 200  
Update requires: No interruption

Name.markdownDescription:
Name for a resource.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^([0-9a-zA-Z][_-]?){1,100}$  
Update requires: No interruption

RoutingConfiguration.description: Routing configuration for a Flow alias.
RoutingConfiguration.markdownDescription:
Routing configuration for a Flow alias.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Arn.markdownDescription:
Arn of the Flow Alias

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^arn:aws(-[^:]+)?:bedrock:[a-z0-9-]{1,20}:[0-9]{12}:flow/[0-9a-zA-Z]{10}/alias/[0-9a-zA-Z]{10}$  
Update requires: No interruption

CreatedAt.markdownDescription:
Time Stamp.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

FlowId.markdownDescription:
Identifier for a flow resource.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^[0-9a-zA-Z]{10}$  
Update requires: No interruption

Id.description: Id for a Flow Alias generated at the server side.

---

Type: String  
Minimum Length: 10
